rule: The category label must not match exactly one of the terms: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech, and must include variations in spelling, capitalization, or punctuation.
validityText:
The input mentions Covid-19, which fits within the category of World news due to its global implications. The input is in English and provides some context that it is related to the Covid-19 update on a global scale. Though the content is minimal, it allows classification into the World category.

OK
